Name: Colours and Symbols
About the game: Colours and Symbols is simple fun and addictive puzzle game! Try to rearrange the coloured symbols to match the sequence card until all coloured symbols are with the same sequence card. A simple challenging yet hard to master the game to exercise your brain! Features 200 puzzles to solve. Easy mouse controls. Clean, minimalist art style.
